::KitKat::

She smiled as she saw Airbomber go down.  BAM! She got hit in the 
shoulder, at the neck.  She fell to the ground on her knees and 
grabbed the wound.  She groaned and picked up her rifle.  She got up 
and started firing again.  She shot at Airbomber.  She then shot at 
Doom Ice.


--- In nbwrpg@egroups.com, "THECODE" <thecode@p...> wrote:
> Airbomber tried to dodge, but BANG! Get's blown down. He aims and 
fires 4
> times at KitKat. Artist runs right into a shot and is leveled. Doom 
Ice
> avoids the shots, and acts like nobody fired at her when she fires 
at the
> base 4 more times. Rizopas growls.
> 
> "Come ON! Come on! Afraid you can't take me in one of one combat? 
Come on!"
> Rizopas says, fast paced, something he did when angry...
